abstracts.cdata!:
The development objectives of the Post
            Primary Education and Training Project are: a) improve
            access to post-primary education, b) improve the quality of
            post-primary education and training, and c) improve
            efficiency in the delivery of post primary education. The
            closing date of the project will be extended by 24 months
            from July 31, 2012 to July 31, 2014. This extension is the
            first restructuring of the project and does not entail any
            change in: 1) the project development objective; 2) the
            results framework; 3) the description of the project or
            components of the project as described in the financing
            agreement; or 4) the safeguards category.
